page.title: 20THE DAIRY FARM
page.content:
Baddiley Farm, Swanley Lane, Ravensmoor. Proprietor: Mr. Winward
The farmer has lived here for 16 years. The farm is 80 hectares, with 12 fields between 2 and 14 hectares. All fields are under grass for grazing and silage. His herd is 260 dairy cows. When a cow is about 3 years old she has her first calf, and hopefully one a year after that. The farmer's day starts at 5 a.m. He milks the cows at 6 a.m and 4 p.m, 18 at a time in the milking parlour. He milks them for 4 minutes and a minute after milking he puts antiseptic on the teats to stop infection. The vet checks the animals every 2 weeks.The milk goes into a large tank and is used for milk or making cheese.
